__e: Well, I kind of told her that you might not mind talking to him.
And he assumed that you wouldn't mind sleeping with him, too, but you said no.
Look, I think that you are very cute and I wouldn't mind going home with you, but I think you might be full of it.
Look, I think that you are very cute and I wouldn't mind going home with you, but I think you might be full of it.
No I know, I know I said it was fine, and that it wouldn't bother me, but it bothers me.
Yes, which is to say I don't think it would bother him at all to know that I'm on the phone.
Well, if it's okay, do you mind if I'm alone?
Would you mind telling me what's going on?
Care to tell me why we're here?
He asks if I mind taking the job in with him.
I've seen something, and I'm not saying there's anything wrong about it, but I'd feel uncomfortable if I kept it to myself.
Would you mind telling your security team that I'm a dear and beloved friend of the family?
Would you mind very much if I didn't come to your party?
Dad, would you mind if I asked Mom to speak instead of you?
Would you mind if I walk through your house one more time, just to refamiliarize myself with the crime scene?
Look, Summer, I'm sorry that you don't believe me, but if you're already going with someone, would you mind if I went with Seth?
Dad, would you mind if I asked Mom to speak instead of you?
Well, that's very generous of you, but, uh, do you mind if I had a talk with my attorney first?
Dr. Shepherd... I wondered if you'd mind if I switch services after today.
Do you think Eddie would mind if I stayed here for a couple of months?
I always thought if I landed a bullet that it would bother me... that it would... it would be a burden to take another life.
